acf.title: Chief Executive Officer, EMEA
acf.bio_copy:
Martin Pabari is Chief Executive Officer, EMEA based in London, and responsible for daily oversight and management of the region.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2019, Martin spent 16 years at CQS in various roles, most recently as Chief Operating Officer and Deputy CEO. Before joining CQS, he held various senior positions within FA&O at Credit Suisse in London and Hong Kong. He began his career at Deloitte & Touche, earning an FCA designation with the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England & Wales.

Martin received his MA in Mathematics from the University of Cambridge.
